overview: Unfortunately Paula's golf club is going to close if she doesn't find a way to attract new clients... But with the help of the well hung golf instructor and the horniest staff members ever to grace a putting green she's sure to be able to satisfy the desires of all her clients. If golf is your game, and you love to get an anal hole in one, this is the film for you.
title: 18 Holes, Passion on the Green
